name: Pixel Clash RTS
description:
Clash with armies of robots, aliens and space marines in this simple RTS.

Teleport in troops and blast your enemy off the battlefield.

  • Clash as or against five different armies.
  • Duel the computer or advance through challenges.
  • Simple RTS controls made for Android.
  • High Fidelity 2.5D Pixel Graphics.
  • A work in progress, leave a review with feedback!
